MSG_REDESIGN_CONTENT: In the coming months, we’ll be starting to roll out a new and improved Citizen OS! Any questions, concerns, or to offer your help as a beta tester, contact Sara on info@citizenos.com
META_DEFAULT_TITLE: Citizen OS - e-Rozhodovací platforma pro komunity.
META_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Citizen OS umožňuje participativní diskusi a hlasování pro skupiny, když současné setkání naživo nebo na internetu není k dispozici.
META_DEFAULT_KEYWORDS: elektronické rozhodování, elektronická správa věcí veřejných, elektronická demokracie, demokracie, přímá demokracie, likvidní demokracie

CREATE.DESC_DISCUSSION: Choose this if you want to encourage a discussion before potentially moving to voting and/or follow-up.
CREATE.DESC_IDEATION: Vyberte tuto možnost, pokud chcete shromáždit nápady před případným přesunutím k hlasování a/nebo následným hlasováním. Žádná diskuze pro/proti není k dispozici.
CREATE.DESC_VOTE: Choose this if you want to collect people’s votes before potentially moving to follow-up. No pro/con discussion available.
CREATE.DESC_GROUP: Create a private or public group to invite people with common interests to access relevant topics.

DUPLICATE_TOPIC.WILL_BE_DUPLICATED_1: Topic content as it is right now (including images, footnotes, comments)

DOWNLOAD_VOTING_RESULTS.MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to download the voting results? This will mean the vote is permanently closed.
DOWNLOAD_VOTING_RESULTS.UPDATE_DEADLINE: Change the deadline to try and collect more votes. This will keep the vote open, so you won't yet see the results.
DOWNLOAD_VOTING_RESULTS.GET_RESULTS: The vote will be permanently closed.
DOWNLOAD_VOTING_RESULTS.FOLLOW_UP: The topic will be moved into 'Follow-up' phase, so you can post updates on actions taken as a result of the vote.

TOPIC_JOIN.HEADING: Připojit se k tématu

TOPIC_JOIN.ITEM_NOTIFICATIONS: Receive notifications of activity within the topic

ONBOARDING.DESCRIPTION: As this is your first time on the newly redesigned Citizen OS dashboard, we recommend you take the walkthrough tour to get to know the platform better.

SEARCH.TITLE: Globální hledání
SEARCH.DESC_START_SEARCH: You can search topics, groups and categories.
SEARCH.TXT_OOPS_NO_RESULTS: Nenašli jsme žádné výsledky odpovídající vašemu hledání :(
SEARCH.TXT_MAYBE_TYPO: Možná je ve vašem hledání překlep?

TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_1_DESC: Quickly create a new discussion topic or voting topic, or set up a new group.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_2_DESC: The main menu serves as your main navigation through the platform. There are quick links to all your topics based on their current phase, i.e. discussion, voting, or follow-up, as well as to any groups you're a member of.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_2_DESC2: You can also access your profile, change the language, or go to the Help Centre.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_3_DESC: Find all your new activity here – new arguments, voting updates, follow-up posts and more. You can open and close the activity feed whenever you want.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_3_DESC2: Pokud od poslední návštěvy došlo k nové aktivitě, bude kanál aktivit ve výchozím nastavení otevřen.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC: Hledáte téma nebo skupinu? Hledejte ho zde.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC2: Hledání je si vědomo toho, zda se nacházíte v nějakém tématu, či nikoliv. Pokud ne, bude vyhledávat po celé platformě.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_4_DESC3: Pokud jste v tématu, bude hledat pouze v tomto tématu.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_5_DESC: Any topics you’re part of will show up on your dashboard, as well as popular public topics you may wish to join.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_5_DESC2: Jakmile se zúčastníte nebo vytvoříte témata, zobrazí se zde.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_6_DESC: Groups are a space in which people with something in common can access relevant topics. For example, members could be part of the same organisation or community. Or have similar interests or goals.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_STEP_6_DESC2: Groups allow a set of topics to be shared quickly and easily - either to invited members, or via a public URL or QR code. New topics can be added at any time, to which members get instant access.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_DASHBOARD_DE: This is your central hub and portal to all parts of the platform - create, browse, engage, and more.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_MY_TOPICS_DE: Zde můžete najít témata, která jste vytvořili nebo jste do nich zapojeni.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_MY_GROUPS_DE: Zde najdete skupiny, které jste založil, nebo jste členem.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_2_LBL_ACTIVITY_FEE: Zde se zobrazí nová aktivita ve vašich tématech a skupinách.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_MOBILE_STEP_3_DESC: Horní menu je vždy dostupné pro navigaci a téma nebo vytváření skupiny. Rychle najdete stránky jako nástěnka, Moje témata, Moje skupiny, veřejné témata a veřejné skupiny.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_TABLET_STEP_2_LBL_PUBLIC_TOPIC: Here you can find all the public topics that have been created on our platform.
TOUR.DASHBOARD_TABLET_STEP_2_LBL_PUBLIC_GROUP: Here you can find all the public groups that have been created on our platform.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC: A topic can have different phases.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_DISCUSSION: In this phase, the main idea is to hold a constructive discussion using pro and con arguments.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_IDEATION: A topic can have an ideation phase, in which anyone can share their ideas on how to tackle the issue at hand.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_VOTE: When there’s a need for a clear representation of where participants lean, you can hold a vote.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_1_DESC_FOLLOW_UP: Po přijetí rozhodnutí nabízí následná fáze způsob, jak udržet účastníky aktuální s dalšími kroky.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC: In each topic you can perform specific actions.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_SEARCH: Najděte cokoliv v rámci samotného tématu a rychle na toto klíčové slovo přeskočte.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_ACTIVITY_FEED: Check out what happened while you were away with the topic's activity feed.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_FAVOURITE: Add or remove this topic to or from your favourites.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_2_DESC_MORE: Here, topic admins and editors can edit the content and settings, invite co-creators or close a topic.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC: Zde jsou všechny příslušné informace o tématu, které byste mohli potřebovat. Je to veřejné nebo soukromé? Kdo je publikoval a kdy?
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC2: Here you can see the social media hashtag used. Clicking on it reveals the social media mentions.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_3_DESC3: You can also view any attachments, check which groups are invited, and see which categories the topic is tagged in.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_4_DESC: Here you can see how many participants are in this topic. Admins can also manage participants permissions, and invite more people.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_5_DESC: A topic can consist of several phases. Here, participants can see an overview of each phase’s status, and admins can add another phase.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_6_DESC: The topic text is the basis for the discussion and/or voting. The main background information will be shared here.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_6_DESC2: By default, we will keep this collapsed, but you can expand it at any time to read the entire text.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC: The main discussion will take place here. Anyone can post a pro or con argument, or provide some additional information.
TOUR.TOPIC_STEP_7_DESC2: Other participants can agree or disagree with arguments, and post replies or reactions.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC: A topic can hold a lot of information. Since this is a small screen, we've organised it to have better focus.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_DOCUMENT: The topic’s text and info are accessible from here.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_DISCUSSION: This is where the discussion takes place, using pro and con arguments.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_IDEATION: A topic can have an ideation phase, in which anyone can share their ideas on how to tackle the issue at hand.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_VOTE: When there’s a need for a clear representation of where participants lean, you can hold a vote.
TOUR.TOPIC_MOBILE_STEP_1_DESC_FOLLOW_UP: After a decision has been made, the follow-up phase offers a way to keep participants up-to-date with the next steps.

TOPIC_ADD_GROUPS.NO_TOPICS_DESC: Add your topic to groups to incentivise members to engage with the topic. This is not mandatory and you can always add topic to the groups later.

TOPIC_ONBOARDING.TITLE: Topics look (and work) a bit differently since the update

TOPIC_VOTE_CAST.LBL_INFO_RESULTS: The results will be shown once the vote ends.
TOPIC_VOTE_CAST.LBL_INFO_RESULTS_ADMIN: The results will be shown once the vote ends. You can close the vote at any time in the manage vote menu.
TOPIC_VOTE_CAST.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_ENDED: You can now download the results.
TOPIC_VOTE_CAST.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_ENDED_EXPIRED: Vote deadline has been reached and voting is now closed
TOPIC_VOTE_CAST.INFO_DELEGATION_DESCRIPTION: They won't know they are voting for you. Your vote will be the same as theirs, but you won't see evidence of how they've voted.

TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to start the topic voting?
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_1: You can no longer (co-)edit your topic text
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_2: You can still invite and share with participants
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_3: Participants can still continue to have a discussion
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_5: You can't edit a vote once you have started it
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_6: You can only start one vote per topic
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_INFO: From here you can move the topic into follow-up.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.VOTE_QUESTION_HEADING: Please add a specific question for the participants to vote on.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.SELECT_VOTING_SYSTEM_DESC: The voting system defines what kind of options the participants will be able to choose from.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.OPTION_VOTING_REGULAR_DESC: Participants can choose from a simple yes, no or neutral
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.OPTION_VOTING_MULTIPLE_DESC: Participants can choose from custom options you set
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_CAN_ADD_EXTRA_OPTIONS: You can also add neutral and veto options.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_SET_UP_VOTING_RIGHTS_DESC: Choose how participants must cast their votes.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_AUTH_HARD_ID_DESC: Voters will have to use e-ID to cast their vote. Vote signatures can be downloaded at the end.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_VOTE_DELEGATION_DESC: Allow users to pass on their voting right. The delegee to won't be informed, but their vote will be counted twice. The delegator won't see how the delegee voted.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_DELEGATION_DESC: Allow users to pass on their voting right.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_DEADLINE_DESC: You can opt to include a deadline, which will close the vote automatically when reached. You can always edit the deadline, or manually close the vote at any time.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_CHOOSE_VOTING_END_DESC: You can choose either a deadline or vote amount, or combine them. When you combine them, the first that is reached will end voting.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_DEADLINE_DESC: When the set date is reached, the voting is closed.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.DEADLINE_LBL_OPTION_SET_VOTE_REMINDER_DE: You can set an automatic reminder email for participants, to be sent out before the voting closes
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_ALL_VOTES_ARE_IN_DESC: When every participant in the topic has voted, the voting system closes.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.PREVIEW_INFO_CHECK: Check your vote is exactly as you want it! You can't edit or pause a vote once you've started it, and can only start one vote per topic.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.PREVIEW_VOTE_TYPE_MULTIPLE: This is a multiple selection voting. The maximum amount of options you can choose: {{maxOptions}}.
TOPIC_VOTE_CREATE.PREVIEW_VOTE_TYPE_REGULAR: This is a single selection vote

TOPIC_VOTE_DEADLINE.LBL_EDIT_VOTING_DEADLINE_DESC: You can choose or edit the voting deadline.
TOPIC_VOTE_DEADLINE.LBL_OPTION_DEADLINE_DESC: When the set date is reached, the voting is closed.
TOPIC_VOTE_DEADLINE.DEADLINE_LBL_OPTION_SET_VOTE_REMINDER_DE: Můžete nastavit automatickou připomínku pro účastníky, která bude odeslána před ukončením hlasování

TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to start the topic follow-up?
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_KEEP_IN_MIND: Věci, které je třeba mít na paměti:
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_2: You can still invite and share with participants
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_3: You can post updates for actions taken as a result of this topic
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_4: Voting in this topic will no longer be possible
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_ITEM_5: Participants can still continue to have a discussion
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DIALOG_TAB_INTRODUCTION_INFO: This is the last stage of a topic.
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_DEADLINE: Set a deadline for the follow-up
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.DEADLINE_LBL_OPTION_SET_VOTE_REMINDER_DE: You can set an automatic reminder email for participants, to be sent out before the voting closes
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.LBL_OPTION_ALL_VOTES_ARE_IN_DESC: When every participant in the topic has voted, the voting system closes.
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.PREVIEW_VOTE_TYPE_MULTIPLE: This is a multiple selection voting. The maximum amount of options you can choose: {{maxOptions}}.
TOPIC_FOLLOW_UP_CREATE.PREVIEW_VOTE_TYPE_REGULAR: This is a single selection voting

TOPIC_INVITE_USER_DELETE.SELECT_HEADING: Please select what you want to do:

TOPIC_VOTE_REMINDER.DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: If you want, you can send a reminder e-mail to the people who haven’t voted yet.
TOPIC_VOTE_REMINDER.REMINDER_PREVIEW_DESC: This is a preview of how the reminder e-mail looks like.
TOPIC_VOTE_REMINDER.PREVIEW_EMAIL_TEXT_WARN: The vote deadline is coming close!
TOPIC_VOTE_REMINDER.PREVIEW_EMAIL_TEXT_DAYS_LEFT: You have only {{daysLeft}} days left to cast your vote.
TOPIC_VOTE_REMINDER.PREVIEW_EMAIL_ATTENTION: You must log in with {{email}} to access this topic.

VERIFY_EMAIL.HEADING: Verify your account
VERIFY_EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: We’ve sent an account verification e-mail to the address
VERIFY_EMAIL.INFO: Please follow the instructions in the e-mail to verify your account. Only after doing this you will be able to log in to Citizen OS!

MODALS.TOPIC_EDIT_DISABLED_HEADING: Editing topic content is no longer available
MODALS.TOPIC_EDIT_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION: This topic text has been locked and is no longer editable
MODALS.TOPIC_EDIT_DISABLED_WHY_DESCRIPTION: When a voting or follow-up gets started, the topic text serves as the single source of truth. By locking it, we can ensure that there's full transparency of participants to know what they're voting on or what next steps are.
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_DISABLED_DESCRIPTION: The settings for this topic are locked for your role.
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_DISABLED_WHY_DESCRIPTION: You only have editing rights which give you the right to collaborate on the topic text, but not change the settings.
MODALS.TOPIC_SETTINGS_DISABLED_INFO: As an editor you can only make edits to the topic text and see the preview.
MODALS.GROUP_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_LOSE_ACCESS: All members of the group will lose access to topics related to this group.
MODALS.GROUP_MEMBER_USER_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
MODALS.TOPIC_CLOSE_CONFIRM_TXT_NO_UNDO: Mějte prosím na paměti, že tuto akci nelze vrátit zpět.
MODALS.TOPIC_CLOSE_CONFIRM_TXT_NO_EDIT: The topic will close, and its contents can no longer be edited.
MODALS.TOPIC_CLOSE_CONFIRM_TXT_NO_VOTE: Voting will end, and further voting will not be possible.
MODALS.TOPIC_COMMENT_REACTIONS_NO_REACTIONS_YET: There are not yet any reactions
MODALS.TOPIC_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_DISCUSSION_DELE: All discussion contributions and votes will be deleted.
MODALS.TOPIC_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_TOPIC_REMOVED_F: The topic will be removed from any groups or categories it is in.
MODALS.TOPIC_MEMBER_GROUP_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_AR: Are you sure you want to remove this group's access to the topic?
MODALS.TOPIC_INVITE_USER_DELETE_CONFIRM_TXT_ARE: Opravdu chcete odstranit pozvánku tohoto uživatele?
MODALS.TOPIC_MEMBER_USER_LEAVE_CONFIRM_TXT_LEAV: Opustit téma bude mít za následek vzdání se práv, která máte jako účastník tohoto tématu
MODALS.TOPIC_REPORT_PLACEHOLDER_REPORT_TEXT: Vysvětlete, proč je toto téma nevhodné...
MODALS.TOPIC_REPORT_TXT_ARE_YOU_SURE: Opravdu chcete nahlásit toto téma? Tuto akci nelze vrátit zpět.

REGISTER.TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION: Wondering what the catch is? There isn't one! We're a non-profit with a mission to empower as many people as possible to participate in respectful, meaningful discussions on the issues that matter to them. We run off donations and grants from long-term funders – which means no fees, no sale of your data, no strings attached!
REGISTER.TOOLTIP_LNK_ABOUT: Read more on our About page

TOPIC_CREATE.HEADING: Create a discussion topic
TOPIC_CREATE.TOOLTIP_TOPIC_INTRO_CONTENT: The intro to your topic will make it easier for participants to get a quick sense of what they'll get involved with.
TOPIC_CREATE.TITLE_INTRO_TEXT: Add a brief introduction or call to action, summarising what the topic is for.
TOPIC_CREATE.TITLE_DESCRIPTION_TEXT: The main topic content goes here - any instructions, information or context for participants.
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_VISIBILITY_DESC: Set whether your topic is visible to anyone, or only by invitation.
TOPIC_CREATE.SETTINGS_ADD_TO_GROUP_DESC: You can add this topic to a group for which you have admin rights, either now or later. All topics in a group are shared with its members, and can be shared via the group's public link too.
TOPIC_CREATE.NO_GROUPS_HEADING: You haven’t joined any groups yet
TOPIC_CREATE.NO_GROUPS_DESCRIPTION: Once you’ve joined a group, you can add this topic to it. Don’t worry, you can skip this now and still do it later.
TOPIC_CREATE.TOOLTIP_GROUP_PERMISSIONS_CONTENT: This will give all members of the group the selected level of permissions to the topic, unless you individually assign them a different permissions level from the topic's 'manage participants' section
TOPIC_CREATE.PREVIEW_INFO: This is a preview of your topic! You can still edit your topic at any point during the discussion phase.
TOPIC_CREATE.WRITE_TOGETHER_DESC: Collaborate on the topic text by inviting co-creators.
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Creating a discussion topic allows the participants to use pro & con arguments, which can help you shape the next phases of the topic.
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_NEXT_DESCRIPTION: What can you do when the topic is published?
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_IDEATION: Add ideation to start gathering ideas
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_VOTING: Add voting to start collecting votes
TOPIC_CREATE.HELP_ITEM_ADD_FOLLOW_UP: Add follow-up to keep participants up to date on any progress made.
TOPIC_CREATE.NOTIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Congratulations on your new topic! Now it’s time to get people engaged. Invite participants below or you can also invite them later.

TOPIC_EDIT.HEADING: Edit topic
TOPIC_EDIT.NOTIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: You have successfully updated your topic!

TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW: Vypadá to, že váš hlasovací proces vyústil v remízu.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_DRAW_DESCRIPTION: Sometimes having several winning options is a good thing, but there are times when you really just need one clear winner.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TITLE_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: Zde je to, co byste mohli nyní udělat:
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_TXT_DRAW_WHAT_NOW: It might be possible to solve this offline - for example, a co-located team could flip a coin between the two winning options. Also, if you had votes going to non-winning options, we suggest you run another vote between the two winning options only. This time, you could pre-determine a tie-breaker in case you have another draw: a coin flip, a default winning option (usually status quo wins in a draw), a person whose vote is decisive, etc.
TOPICS_TOPICID.DESCRIPTION_REPORTED: Since you’re a moderator of this topic, there are several actions you can take:
TOPICS_TOPICID.DESCRIPTION_REPORTED_ADMIN: Since you’re an admin/author of this topic, there are several actions you can take:
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_LNK_MODERATE: Hide this topic if you agree with why it was reported
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_INFO_LNK_RESOLVE: Mark as resolved if the topic (again) conforms to the Citizen OS Rules of Conduct
TOPICS_TOPICID.ADD_MILESTONES_PLACEHOLDER_SUBJECT: Jak se rozhodnutí uvádí do praxe?
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This vote requires an ID-card or Mobiil-ID signature.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_REQUIRE_HARD_ID: This vote needs to be signed with an ID-card or Mobiil-ID to be registered. You cannot vote without identifying yourself.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_REGISTERED: Thank you for your vote. You can still change your vote at any time before the voting closes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED: To download voting results, select a suitable format below. Our "human-readable" container comes with an additional spreadsheet file (.csv, comma-separated table) containing data for each individual vote, as required by Riigikogu and local governments. For systems that can't process such info (such as Äriregister) please select "machine-readable" file.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_VOTE_CLOSED_EXPIRED: Hlasy byly nyní odeslány. Zašlete prosím téma k následování a pak se vraťte sem, abyste si stáhli výsledky hlasování.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_SOFT_ID_EXPLANATION: Přihlášení do systému Citizen OS je vyžadováno
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_AUTH_HARD_ID_EXPLANATION: ID-Card, Mobiil-ID nebo Smart-ID podpis je vyžadován
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_DELEGATION_EXPLANATION: Povolit uživatelům předat své hlasovací právo.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_NOTICE_DELEGATION_DISABLED_FOR_: Pokud je eID zvolenou metodou hlasování, delegování není povoleno.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_HEADING_STEP4_DESCRIPTION: You can choose either a deadline or vote amount, or combine them. When you combine them, the first that is reached will end voting.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_VOTE_AMOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Define the end of the voting system based on the amount of votes counted. You can only choose one.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_MINIMUM_VOTES_DESCRIPTION: Počet hlasů potřebných pro úspěšné uzavření.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_ALL_VOTES_ARE_IN_EXPLANATION: When every user in the topic has voted, the voting system closes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_LBL_SET_VOTE_REMINDER_EXPLANATION: You can set an automatic reminder email for users a few days before the end of the voting
TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_YOU_CAN_CHOOSE_OPTIONS: This is a multiple selection voting. You can choose max {{maxChoices}} options that align with your view.
TOPICS_TOPICID.VOTE_TXT_DESCRIPTION_CHOICE_RANGE: Define the max amount of choices a person can vote for. For example, you have 4 choices but you allow people to choose up to 2 out of them. You can only add as many as you have choices to choose from.
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_CREATOR_REMOVED_ARGUMENT: This argument was removed by argument creator
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_READ_CODE_OF_CONDUCT: Přečtěte si náš kodex chování a získejte více informací
TOPICS_TOPICID.ARGUMENT_REPLY_FOUND_INAPPRIOPRIATE_BY: Tato odpověď byla uživatelem {{usersFullName}} shledána nevhodnou
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_P: Tuto možnost použijte, pokud souhlasíte a chcete opustit argument, který je podpůrný nebo ve prospěch tématu.
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_C: Tuto možnost použijte, pokud nesouhlasíte a chcete ponechat argument, který toto téma nepodporuje.
TOPICS_TOPICID.COMMENT_TYPE_SELECT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_P: Tuto možnost použijte, pokud chcete učinit krátké prohlášení nebo pointu, položit otázku nebo vysvětlení tématu.
TOPICS_TOPICID.PLACEHOLDER_EXPLAIN_YOUR_ARGUMENT: Zde vysvětlete a potvrďte své prohlášení...
TOPICS_TOPICID.LOG_IN_TO_PARTICIPATE: You need to log in to participate.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_METIONS_TXT_NO_HASHTAG_DEFINE: Sorry, we cannot show social mentions as there is no hashtag linked to this topic. Topic admins can add the hashtag to pull in social mentions.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TAB_SOCIAL_MENTIONS_NO_MENTIONS_FOUND: Sorry, no social mentions found on X for the hashtag
TOPICS_TOPICID.TXT_QR_CODE_FOOTER_SCAN_CODE: Přejděte přímo na téma {{topicTitle}} přes naskenování tohoto QR kódu!
TOPICS_TOPICID.SECTION_INFO_NO_ATTACHMENTS: There are currently no attachments for this topic
TOPICS_TOPICID.SECTION_INFO_NO_GROUPS: There are currently no groups for this topic
TOPICS_TOPICID.SECTION_INFO_NO_CATEGORIES: There are currently no categories for this topic
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_HEADING: There is no voting system yet
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_DESC_BEFORE: By adding a voting system to your topic, you have a final opportunity to find out what participants think of it. You can set up different types of voting, depending on your needs.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_VOTING_DESC_AFTER: After voting has finished, you can download the results files to take the decision forward.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_UP_HEADING: There is no follow-up system yet
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_DESC_BEFORE: Follow-up is the last phase of a topic. After a decision has been made, it's important to keep participants up to date with the next steps.
TOPICS_TOPICID.NO_FOLLOW_DESC_AFTER: Describe, what will happen as a result of the made decisions, adding details of any progress or outcomes.
TOPICS_TOPICID.TUTORIAL_DESC: New to the platform? Or first time since the redesign? We’d love to guide you through how topics work.

VOTE_CREATE.HEADING: Create a voting topic
VOTE_CREATE.PREVIEW_INFO: This is a preview of your topic! You can still edit your topic at any point prior to starting the vote.
VOTE_CREATE.HELP_DESCRIPTION: Creating a voting topic allows you to cut straight to the vote. If you'd like a discussion before voting, create a discussion topic then add a voting phase
